A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wow\, what a disappointment\, I generally liked the force awakens but acknowledge it's flaws but last Jedi seems like a bag full of missed opportunities. Flying Leia\,? really? Hologram force projection Luke? Just really really bad compounded by the fact that they unwaveringly built Leia's character up for the next movie when they had a perfect opportunity to cleanly end her storyline which would have been prudent given the circumstances. I think this is the end of Star wars for me
